OUTLINE : - Preparative regimen : Patients undergo total body irradiation twice daily day -6 -4 . Patients receive dose-adjusted ( base metabolism ) cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour day -3 -2 . - Hematopoietic stem cell ( HSC ) infusion : Patients undergo allogeneic HSC transplantation day 0 . Patients receive graft-versus-host disease prophylaxis , CNS prophylaxis , testicular irradiation per institutional standard practice . Patients follow daily day 80 transplantation regularly thereafter survival . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 20 patient accrue study .
